home.title: Plurality Tokyo
home.subtitle: A community for building a plural future for everyone
home.ecosystemDescription: Plurality Tokyo connects with a global network of organizations and initiatives focused on innovative social technologies, digital democracy, and community governance.
home.joinDescription: Connect with other members interested in Plurality, stay updated about upcoming events, and participate in discussions.
home.pluralityWeekDescription: From May 6th to 12th, join us for a week of dialogue on plurality with Audrey Tang and E. Glen Weyl across Tokyo. Don't miss this special week featuring sessions at the University of Tokyo, Keio University, SusHi Tech Tokyo, and Tokyo College.

events.conferenceDesc: Conferences held irregularly to promote discussions about plurality in Japan.
events.discordDesc: An online community for daily discussions and exchange of ideas about plurality.
events.meetupDesc: Smaller meetups held irregularly as a place for more intimate exchanges.

about.title: About Plurality Tokyo
about.introductionText: Plurality Tokyo is a community that is inspired by the global Plurality movement. Based in Tokyo yet working together across Japan, we thrive to explore and experiment how technology can develop ways to collaborate across social and cultural difference.
about.visionText: We believe in using technology as a tool to guide progress and growth, rather than as a substitute for human connection. Our approach focuses on respecting diverse values through a delicate framework, as opposed to traditional reductionist systems.
communityItems: Knowledge co-creation and sharing using tools such as Cosense (Scrapbox)
Vibrant conversation on a Discord server
about.joinUsText: We welcome anyone who is passionate about and interested in exploring the possibilities of technology to create a more inclusive and collaborative society. Join our community to learn, share, and build together.
